content:
Hey @WG-traits!

It's been a bit since we've had a meeting together (in favor of smaller, more focused meetings). Inspired by @nikomatsakis, I was wondering if everyone might be interested in having a meeting sometime early next week to discuss 2021 as a retrospective. Basically, what did we accomplish, what didn't we finish that we wanted to, and I suppose also what our goals for next year are (high-level, of course; I'm not thinking of this as planning meeting).

I would be interested in doing a zoom meeting if people are interested, but text also works. I think we've been really productive this year and I'd love to hear people brag about what they've done :wink:

Even if we don't end up doing a synchronous meeting, I'll probably still end up making a HackMD that I'd like for people to add the things they've done! Inspired by @WG-async-foundations, it would be nice to put out a blog post.
Thumbs up this message if you'd like to do a meeting early next week. Thumbs down if you'd not like to.
I'd be interested in sitting in to observe and get a better feel of what the WG is working on/planning for next year, if that's ok? If there's stuff I can get involved with, I'll do what I can.
Of course :)
I'd be interested in sitting in as well
I'd be up to chat
What's the best way to schedule this?
Best for me would be Dec 22 I think
That works for me. Any specific times?
Does 2021-12-21T13:00:00-05:00 work for people? Same day/time as previous meetings?
Whoops. Fixed
ping @nikomatsakis particularly
Is this going ahead tomorrow? By what medium? Just in this stream on Zulip?
@Jack Huey I'd like to join in if this is still happening. I've been working on some stuff for polonius that will need to be integrated into chalk
I don't think it will (haven't heard from @nikomatsakis on specifics). We should definitely plan a meeting beginning of next year (with a bit more time to plan) though.
Still need to setup that HackMD though
Btw I'm working on a hackmd here: https://hackmd.io/Zkuz1m0TQIaeW8tF3rulLg
Honestly trying to figure out the best format here
omg there's so much
